biotools.summary: Mouse Multiple Tissue Metabolome Database: metabolomic database containing a collection of metabolites measured from multiple tissues from single mice. The datases are collected using a single instrument and not integrated from literatures, which is useful for capturing the holistic overview of large metabolomic pathway.

bioschemas.name: MMMDB
